title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) As used in this

Part, retired member shall mean a former member of the Division of State Police
who enters service or disability retirement after October 31, 1999 and who, upon separation from service, was immediately entitled to receive retirement
benefits under the provisions of the Retirement and Social Security

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
470.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
